## blend() function

Blend two colors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function blend(mode: ColorBlendMode, bottom: ColorRGBA64, top: ColorRGBA64): ColorRGBA64;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mode | [ColorBlendMode](./fast-colors.colorblendmode.md) |  |
|  bottom | [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) |  |
|  top | [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md)

## Remarks

The alpha channel of the input is ignored
